o_sentence: The Company MUST maintain a consolidated leverage ratio below 4.0x under its credit agreement.
p_sentence: Management MAY incur additional borrowings subject to lender consent unless the leverage ratio exceeds 4.25x.

o_sentence: The borrower MUST maintain an interest coverage ratio above 3.0x across all secured loans.
p_sentence: The borrower MAY incur secured debt subject to lender approval unless a default exists.

o_sentence: The company MUST maintain a minimum unrestricted cash balance of $100 million.
p_sentence: The company MAY borrow additional funds subject to covenant compliance unless the fixed charge coverage ratio falls below 1.5x.

o_sentence: The company MUST maintain prudent liquidity consistent with its investment grade rating.
p_sentence: The company MAY issue notes for strategic investments in accordance with board-approved policies.

o_sentence: The company MUST maintain strong cash flow generation to fund strategic investments.
p_sentence: The company MAY issue notes within authorized limits.

o_sentence: The company MUST maintain financial flexibility to pursue R&D investments.
p_sentence: The company MAY borrow under its revolving credit agreement subject to customary approvals.
